hike.name: Knorrhütte – Zugspitzplatt Runde von Eibsee
hike.required_condition: Very good fitness, good sure-footedness, sturdy footwear, and alpine experience required.
hike.notes: Parts of this route involve very technical, difficult, or dangerous terrain. Special equipment and prior knowledge are essential.

highlights.name: Weg zur Knorrhütte
highlights.description: A beautiful hiking area leading up to the Zugspitze.

highlights.name: Knorrhütte
highlights.description: A rustic Alpine hut in the rocky fields below the Zugspitze with great views of the Reintal valley and the surrounding peaks. Water refill available.

highlights.name: Panoramablick
highlights.description: A rocky area with little greenery but excellent panoramic views.

highlights.name: Schneefernereck
highlights.description: Impressive rocky landscape, often with large, old snowfields.

highlights.name: Zugspitzplatt
highlights.description: The Zugspitzplatt can be reached by descending a dangerous gravel slope or by using the glacier railway from the Zugspitze.

highlights.name: Klettersteig
highlights.description: The via ferrata is doable even without a via ferrata set.

highlights.name: Blick zum Gletscher
highlights.description: Just before reaching the Zugspitze platform, enjoy a great view back towards the glacier.

highlights.name: Zugspitze Gipfel
highlights.description: The summit of the Zugspitze offers breathtaking views in all directions.

highlights.name: Bergstation Zugspitzbahn
highlights.description: Enjoy stunning views from the top of the Zugspitze. Recommended for those interested in a longer experience.

hike.accessibility: Starting point is accessible via public transport.
hike.recommended_for: Experienced hikers with good physical condition, alpine experience, and proper equipment.
